title: 149 AJ Hawk on Family, Hard Work, and the Heart of a Champion
description:
"Whatever morals and standards I have in life, I want to take to the field." - AJ Hawk
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/149.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
